name: My Rachel
description:
WARNING: there are compatibility issues with Chrome. Please play on Firefox, Edge, or Safari.

My Rachel is an interactive fiction game created in Twine for Ludum Dare 35. Players take on the role of a mysterious shapeshifting character obsessed with Rachel MacCormack, whose death has cast a shadow over her small town. 

Take the guise of townsfolk to gather information. Learn their stories to avoid suspicion. Uncover the truth behind her death. After all, she wasn't just anyone...she was Rachel.

Note: This game contains text discussions of death, alcohol use and abuse, drug use and abuse, adult-minor relationships, suicide, murder, and assault.
